verses.verse: <S%G4405><s%> And Morning <S%G1161><s%> Being Come, <S%G1096><s%> Counsel <S%G4824><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> They Might Put To Death <S%G2289><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Bound <S%G1210><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Led Away Him <S%G520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor. <S%G2232><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Was Condemned, <S%G2632><s%> Having Regretted It <S%G3338><s%> Returned <S%G654><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thirty <S%G5144><s%> Pieces Of Silver <S%G694><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I Sinned <S%G264><s%> Delivering Up <S%G3860><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Guiltless. <S%G121><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> What Is That <S%G5101><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Us? <S%G2248><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Wilt See To It. <S%G3700><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Cast Down <S%G4496><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pieces Of Silver <S%G694><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> He Withdrew, <S%G402><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Away <S%G565><s%> Hanged Himself. <S%G519><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pieces Of Silver <S%G694><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not Lawful <S%G1832><s%> To Put <S%G906><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Treasury, <S%G2878><s%> Since The <S%G1893><s%> Price <S%G5092><s%> Of Blood <S%G129><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Counsel <S%G4824><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Having Taken, <S%G2983><s%> They Bought <S%G59><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Field <S%G68><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Potter, <S%G2763><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Burying Ground <S%G5027><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For Strangers. <S%G3581><s%>
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Was Called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G68><s%> That Field <S%G1565><s%> Field <S%G68><s%> Of Blood <S%G129><s%> To <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This Day. <S%G4594><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Was Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Jeremiah <S%G2408><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Took <S%G2983><s%> <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thirty <S%G5144><s%> Pieces Of Silver, <S%G694><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Price <S%G5092><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Set A Price On, <S%G5091><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Set A Price On <S%G5091><s%> Of The <S%G575><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel, <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Field <S%G68><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Potter, <S%G2763><s%> According As <S%G2505><s%> Directed <S%G4929><s%> Me The <S%G3427><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor; <S%G2232><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor, <S%G2232><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G5346><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Sayest. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> And <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> When Was Accused <S%G2723><s%> He <S%G846><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> He Answered. <S%G611><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Hearest Thou Not <S%G191><s%> How Many Things <S%G4214><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> They Witness Against? <S%G2649><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Did Not Answer <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Even <S%G3761><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Word, <S%G4487><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor <S%G2232><s%> Exceedingly. <S%G3029><s%>

<S%G2596><s%> Now At The <S%G1161><s%> Feast <S%G1859><s%> Was Accustomed <S%G1486><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor <S%G2232><s%> To Release <S%G630><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G3793><s%> Prisoner, <S%G1198><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Wished. <S%G2309><s%>
<S%G2192><s%> And They Had <S%G1161><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> A Prisoner <S%G1198><s%> Notable, <S%G1978><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Barabbas. <S%G912><s%>

Being Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Will Ye That <S%G2309><s%> I Release <S%G630><s%> To You? <S%G5213><s%> Barabbas, <S%G912><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G3004><s%> Christ? <S%G5547><s%>
<S%G1492><s%> For He Knew <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Envy <S%G5355><s%> They Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

As Was Sitting <S%G2521><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment Seat <S%G968><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1135><s%> His Wife, <S%G846><s%> Saying, Let There Be <S%G3004><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Between Thee <S%G4671><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> That Man; <S%G1565><s%> <S%G4183><s%> For Many Things <S%G1063><s%> I Suffered <S%G3958><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> ' In <S%G2596><s%> A Dream <S%G3677><s%> ' Because Of <S%G1223><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Persuaded <S%G3982><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Should Beg For <S%G154><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Barabbas, <S%G912><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Should Destroy. <S%G622><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor <S%G2232><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G5101><s%> Will Ye <S%G2309><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two That <S%G1417><s%> I Release <S%G630><s%> To You? <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> Barabbas. <S%G912><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Shall I Do With <S%G4160><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G3004><s%> ; Christ? <S%G5547><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> Let Him Be Crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Governor <S%G2232><s%> Said, <S%G5346><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G1063><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Did He Commit? <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> The More <S%G4057><s%> Cried Out, <S%G2896><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let Him Be Crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Seeing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> It Availed, <S%G5623><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> A Tumult <S%G2351><s%> Is Arising, <S%G1096><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> He Washed His <S%G633><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Before <S%G561><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Guiltless <S%G121><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1342><s%> Of This Righteous Man; <S%G5127><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Will See To It. <S%G3700><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He Released <S%G630><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Barabbas; <S%G912><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Scourged <S%G5417><s%> He Delivered Up Him <S%G3860><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Be Crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Soldiers <S%G4757><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Governor, <S%G2232><s%> Having Taken With Them <S%G3880><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Praetorium, <S%G4232><s%> Gathered <S%G4863><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Band; <S%G4686><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Stripped <S%G1562><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Put Round <S%G4060><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Cloak <S%G5511><s%> Scarlet; <S%G2847><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Platted <S%G4120><s%> A Crown <S%G4735><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Thorns <S%G173><s%> They Put It <S%G2007><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> His Head, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Reed <S%G2563><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> His; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bowing The Knees <S%G1120><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Mocked <S%G1702><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hail, <S%G5463><s%> <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews! <S%G2453><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Spit <S%G1716><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Took <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Reed <S%G2563><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Struck Him <S%G5180><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> His Head. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> They Had Mocked <S%G1702><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Took Off <S%G1562><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cloak, <S%G5511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Put On <S%G1746><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Own Garments; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Led Away <S%G520><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Crucify. <S%G4717><s%>

<S%G1831><s%> And Going Forth <S%G1161><s%> They Found <S%G2147><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> A Cyrenian, <S%G2956><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Simon; <S%G4613><s%> Him <S%G5126><s%> They Compelled <S%G29><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Carry <S%G142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4716><s%> His Cross. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Golgotha, <S%G1115><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Of A Skull <S%G2898><s%> Place, <S%G5117><s%>

They Gave <S%G1325><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Drink <S%G4095><s%> Vinegar <S%G3690><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Gall <S%G5521><s%> Mingled; <S%G3396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Tasted <S%G1089><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Would Not <S%G2309><s%> Drink. <S%G4095><s%>

<S%G4717><s%> And Having Crucified <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Divided <S%G1266><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments, <S%G846><s%> Casting <S%G906><s%> A Lot; <S%G2819><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Might Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> They Divided <S%G1266><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> My Garments <S%G3450><s%>, Among Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2441><s%> My Vesture <S%G3450><s%> They Cast <S%G906><s%>, A Lot. <S%G2819><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Sitting Down <S%G2521><s%> They Kept Guard Over <S%G5083><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> There. <S%G1563><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Put Up <S%G2007><s%> Over <S%G1883><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> His Head <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G156><s%> His Accusation <S%G846><s%> Written : <S%G1125><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Are Crucified <S%G4717><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Robbers, <S%G3027><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At The <S%G1537><s%> Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> At The <S%G1537><s%> Left. <S%G2176><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But Those <S%G1161><s%> Passing By <S%G3899><s%> Railed At <S%G987><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Shaking <S%G2795><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> Their Heads, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thou Who <S%G3588><s%> Destroyest <S%G2647><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Buildest It, <S%G3618><s%> Save <S%G4982><s%>, Thyself. <S%G4572><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Thou Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Descend <S%G2597><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross. <S%G4716><s%>

In Like Manner <S%G3668><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests, <S%G749><s%> Mocking, <S%G1702><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%>

Others <S%G243><s%> He Saved, <S%G4982><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Save. <S%G4982><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Israel <S%G2474><s%> He Is, <S%G2076><s%> Let Him Descend <S%G2597><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross, <S%G4716><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Will Believe <S%G4100><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

He Trusted <S%G3982><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God : <S%G2316><s%> Let Him Deliver <S%G4506><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> He Will Have <S%G2309><s%>, Him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2036><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For He Said, <S%G3754><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>
